sentences.en: ...her lawyer husband, trapped in a humdrum but well-paid job.
sentences.cn: ...她整天做着单调乏味的工作但收入颇丰的律师丈夫。

sentences.en: A year on, their problems seem humdrum, not horrific.
sentences.cn: 一年过去, 它们的问题似乎平淡无奇, 一点也不可怕.

sentences.en: After his years of adventure, he could not settle down to a humdrum life.
sentences.cn: 多年的冒险生涯使他无法安下心来过这种单调的生活.

sentences.en: ENTP ( Extroverted intuiting with thinking ): These are lively people, not humdrum or orderly.
sentences.cn: 外向,凭洞察力思考 ): 这是活泼的一群, 而非单调、固守传统的.

sentences.en: Film exhibition was until recently a humdrum business.
sentences.cn: 直到最近,电影展成为一项无聊的业务.

sentences.en: He was sick of the humdrum of his fellow prisoners.
sentences.cn: 他讨厌囚犯伙伴们的乏味.

sentences.en: Imagination raises a man above the humdrum of life.
sentences.cn: 想象使人从单调无聊的生活中解脱出来.

sentences.en: It was a narrow, humdrum place.
sentences.cn: 那是个狭窄 、 枯燥的地方.

sentences.en: Last but not least, students'creativity tends to repressed due to the humdrum and dull homework.
sentences.cn: 最后, 学生们的创造力在单调乏味的作业压力下受到极大的压抑.

sentences.en: She was tired of the humdrum life in the countryside and desired to go out.
sentences.cn: 她对乡下单调的生活感到厌倦,渴望走出去.

sentences.en: The accountant said it was the most humdrum day that she had ever passed.
sentences.cn: 会计师说这是她所度过的最无聊的一天.

sentences.en: The mandate of heaven can be embodied in such humdrum entities as building codes.
sentences.cn: 天意却能在诸如建筑这样的单调的实体间具体表现出来.

sentences.en: They might marry, and sink to the humdrum of other old married people.
sentences.cn: 他们可能结婚, 然后陷于像那些老年夫妻一样的平凡.

sentences.en: What Orpheus does produce are performances that are rarely humdrum, unlike all too many big - name orchestras.
sentences.cn: 与绝大多数大牌管弦乐团的演奏不同,奥菲斯乐团的表演的确很少给人产生单调乏味之感.

trans.tran_en: boring and ordinary, and having no variety or interest
